channel.title: Authors on Mario D. Molina
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Mario D. Molina

item.description: I am a PhD candidate in the Department of Sociology at Cornell University. My research focuses on social hierarchies, how individuals perceive their legitimacy, and how they affect social cohesion. I am also broadly interested in the use of computational methods (e.g. online experiments, machine learning, and natural language processing) to study interesting sociological questions.
